com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl

Class TopicDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl.AbstractDao<Topic>
      • com.epam.finaltask.dao.impl.TopicDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<Topic>, TopicDao

    class TopicDaoImpl
extends AbstractDao<Topic>
implements TopicDao
    Class that implements CRUD and several other operations to work with database topics.

      • constructTopicsFromResultSet

        private java.util.List<Topic> constructTopicsFromResultSet(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                           java.io.IOException
        Creates list of topics using result set. ResultSet should contain next values in specific columns (value - columnIndex): topicId - 1, closed - 2, title - 3, text - 4, date - 5, accountId - 6, hidden - 7.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - ResultSet which data is used to create list of topics
        Returns:
        List of topics created using result set data
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If exception is thrown while getting values from the result set.
        java.io.IOException - If clob character streams can't be acquired
